column1: Nabagram is a village in Nabagram CD Block in Murshidabad district in the Indian state of West Bengal.
Nabagram police station has jurisdiction over Nabagram CD Block.
The headquarters of Nabagram CD Block are located at Nabagram.
As per 2011 Census of India Nabagram had a total population of 6
column4: 404 (49%) were females. Population below 6 years was 808. The total number of literates in Nabagram was 4

column1: Nabagram Amar Chand Kundu College was established in 2009 at Nabagram. Affiliated with the University of Kalyani it offers courses in Bengali and history.
Nabagram Block Primary Health Centre functions with 15 beds at Nabagram.
